sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import { Modal, Button, Form } from "react-bootstrap";

function EditNotebookModal({ show, handleClose, notebookData, setNotebookData, handleSave }) {
  return (
    <Modal show={show} onHide={handleClose}>
      <Modal.Header closeButton>
        <Modal.Title>Edit Notebook</Modal.Title>
      </Modal.Header>
      <Modal.Body>
        <Form>
          <Form.Group controlId="formNotebookName" className="mb-3">
            <Form.Label>Title</Form.Label>
            <Form.Control
              type="text"
              value={notebookData.notebookName}
              onChange={(e) =>
                setNotebookData({ ...notebookData, notebookName: e.target.value })
              }
            />
          </Form.Group>

          <Form.Group controlId="formNotes" className="mb-3">
            <Form.Label>Notes</Form.Label>
            <Form.Control
              as="textarea"
              rows={3}
              value={notebookData.notes}
              onChange={(e) =>
                setNotebookData({ ...notebookData, notes: e.target.value })
              }
            />
          </Form.Group>

          <Form.Group controlId="formResolution" className="mb-3">
            <Form.Label>Resolution</Form.Label>
            <Form.Control
              type="text"
              value={notebookData.resolution}
              onChange={(e) =>
                setNotebookData({ ...notebookData, resolution: e.target.value })
              }
            />
          </Form.Group>
        </Form>
      </Modal.Body>
      <Modal.Footer>
        <Button variant="secondary" onClick={handleClose}>
          Cancel
        </Button>
        <Button variant="primary" onClick={handleSave}>
          Save Changes
        </Button>
      </Modal.Footer>
    </Modal>
  );
}

export default EditNotebookModal;
